name: Five Nights
description:
A nice little game, done in 3 days for my first game jam, The Great Autumn Game Jam 2021.

Five nights, five Halloween, this little girl want to have the most terrifying costume and the most candy ! 

Upgrade the costume as you go and be carreful of the spider, don't eat them, or even touch them with your tongue, Darling ! Except if you have the upgrade for it, then you can.

Try to get the highest score ! 🎃🎃

(edit : the ending wasn't right when it was first posted, my bad, it should be fixed!)

(Music : "Groovy Ghouls" by Steve Oxen)
